Module com.example.batallanaval
Package com.example.batallanaval.controller

Interface IStartViewController

All Known Implementing Classes:
StartViewController, StartViewControllerAdapter
public interface IStartViewController
Interface for the Start View Controller of the Battleship game. Defines the basic contract for initializing the start view and handling user interactions such as starting a new game, continuing a saved game, viewing instructions, and exiting the application.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Juan Esteban Arias, Junior Lasprilla Prada, Steven Fernando Arag√≥n

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      void initialize()
      Initializes the start view. Typically sets up button handlers and file handlers.

    • handlePlay

      void handlePlay(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the event triggered when the user clicks the "Start Game" button.
      Parameters:

    • handleContinue

      void handleContinue(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the event triggered when the user clicks the "Continue" button. Loads saved game state if available.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event triggered by the button click

    • handleInstructions

      void handleInstructions(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the event triggered when the user clicks the "Instructions" button. Navigates to the instructions view.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event triggered by the button click

    • handleExit

      void handleExit(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the event triggered when the user clicks the "Exit" button. Closes the application.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event triggered by the button click
